verses.verse: וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> Again the word יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came [to me] saying

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts קִנֵּ֥אתִי <WH7065> I was jealous לְצִיּ֖וֹן <WH6726> for Zion קִנְאָ֣ה <WH7068> jealousy גְדוֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> with great וְחֵמָ֥ה <WH2534> fury גְדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> for her with great קִנֵּ֥אתִי <WH7065> and I was jealous לָֽהּ׃

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD שַׁ֚בְתִּי <WH7725> I am returned אֶל־ <WH413> to צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> unto Zion וְשָׁכַנְתִּ֖י <WH7931> and will dwell בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְנִקְרְאָ֤ה <WH7121> shall be called יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> and Jerusalem עִ֣יר־ <WH5892> a city הָֽאֱמֶ֔ת <WH571> of truth וְהַר־ <WH2022> and the mountain יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הַ֥ר <WH2022> mountain הַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> the holy ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עֹ֤ד <WH5750> will again יֵֽשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> dwell זְקֵנִ֣ים <WH2205> There shall yet old men וּזְקֵנ֔וֹת <WH2205> and old women בִּרְחֹב֖וֹת <WH7339> in the streets יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְאִ֧ישׁ <WH376> and every man מִשְׁעַנְתּ֛וֹ <WH4938> with his staff בְּיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> in his hand מֵרֹ֥ב <WH7230> for very יָמִֽים׃ <WH3117> age

וּרְחֹב֤וֹת <WH7339> And the streets הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> of the city יִמָּ֣לְא֔וּ <WH4390> shall be full יְלָדִ֖ים <WH3206> of boys וִֽילָד֑וֹת <WH3207> and girls מְשַׂחֲקִ֖ים <WH7832> playing בִּרְחֹֽבֹתֶֽיהָ׃ <WH7339> in the streets ס

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts כִּ֣י <WH3588> If יִפָּלֵ֗א <WH6381> If it be marvellous בְּעֵינֵי֙ <WH5869> in the eyes שְׁאֵרִית֙ <WH7611> of the remnant הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> of this בַּיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> in these days הָהֵ֑ם <WH1992> those גַּם־ <WH1571> also בְּעֵינַי֙ <WH5869> the sight יִפָּלֵ֔א <WH6381> should it also be marvellous נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> said יְהוָ֥ה <WH3069> God צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts פ

כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֔וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> I am going מוֹשִׁ֛יעַ <WH3467> Behold I will save אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> my people מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> country מִזְרָ֑ח <WH4217> from the east וּמֵאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> country מְב֥וֹא <WH3996> entry הַשָּֽׁמֶשׁ׃ <WH8121> east side

וְהֵבֵאתִ֣י <WH935> And I will bring אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וְשָׁכְנ֖וּ <WH7931> them and they shall dwell בְּת֣וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְהָיוּ־ <WH1961> become לִ֣י לְעָ֗ם <WH5971> and they shall be my people וַֽאֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֶהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> become לָהֶם֙ לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <WH430> and I will be their God בֶּאֱמֶ֖ת <WH571> in truth וּבִצְדָקָֽה׃ <WH6666> and in righteousness ס

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֒ <WH6635> of hosts תֶּחֱזַ֣קְנָה <WH2388> be strong יְדֵיכֶ֔ם <WH3027> Let your hands הַשֹּֽׁמְעִים֙ <WH8085> ye that hear בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> in these days הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these אֵ֖ת <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> to these מִפִּי֙ <WH6310> by the mouth הַנְּבִיאִ֔ים <WH5030> of the prophets אֲ֠שֶׁר <WH834> who בְּי֞וֹם <WH3117> which [were] in the day יֻסַּ֨ד <WH3245> was laid בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֛וֹת <WH6635> of hosts הַהֵיכָ֖ל <WH1964> that the temple לְהִבָּנֽוֹת׃ <WH1129> might be built

כִּ֗י <WH3588> For לִפְנֵי֙ <WH6440> For before הַיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> these days הָהֵ֔ם <WH1992> those שְׂכַ֤ר <WH7939> no hire הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> for man לֹ֣א <WH3808> no נִֽהְיָ֔ה <WH1961> there was וּשְׂכַ֥ר <WH7939> nor any hire הַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> for beast אֵינֶ֑נָּה <WH369> there וְלַיּוֹצֵ֨א <WH3318> to him that went out וְלַבָּ֤א <WH935> or came in אֵין־ <WH369> there שָׁלוֹם֙ <WH7965> neither [was there any] peace מִן־ <WH4480> because הַצָּ֔ר <WH6862> because of the affliction וַאֲשַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> for I set אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> all men אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one בְּרֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> against his neighbour

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> now לֹ֣א <WH3808> not כַיָּמִ֤ים <WH3117> days הָרִֽאשֹׁנִים֙ <WH7223> as in the former אֲנִ֔י <WH589> I לִשְׁאֵרִ֖ית <WH7611> But now I [will] not [be] unto the residue הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּ֑ה <WH2088> of this נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <WH6635> of hosts

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for זֶ֣רַע <WH2233> For the seed הַשָּׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> [shall be] prosperous הַגֶּ֜פֶן <WH1612> the vine תִּתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> shall give פִּרְיָהּ֙ <WH6529> her fruit וְהָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <WH776> and the ground תִּתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> shall give אֶת־ <WH853> יְבוּלָ֔הּ <WH2981> her increase וְהַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> and the heavens יִתְּנ֣וּ <WH5414> shall give טַלָּ֑ם <WH2919> their dew וְהִנְחַלְתִּ֗י <WH5157> to possess אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאֵרִ֛ית <WH7611> and I will cause the remnant הָעָ֥ם <WH5971> of this people הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> of this אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וְהָיָ֡ה <WH1961> will come כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> you הֱיִיתֶ֨ם <WH1961> may become קְלָלָ֜ה <WH7045> And it shall come to pass [that] as ye were a curse בַּגּוֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> among the heathen בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> O house יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah וּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> and house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> so אוֹשִׁ֣יעַ <WH3467> so will I save אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> וִהְיִיתֶ֖ם <WH1961> you may become בְּרָכָ֑ה <WH1293> you and ye shall be a blessing אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֖אוּ <WH3372> fear תֶּחֱזַ֥קְנָה <WH2388> be strong יְדֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH3027> not [but] let your hands ס

כִּ֣י <WH3588> For כֹ֣ה <WH3541> thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> For thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֒ <WH6635> of hosts כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> I זָמַמְ֜תִּי <WH2161> As I thought לְהָרַ֣ע <WH7489> to punish לָכֶ֗ם בְּהַקְצִ֤יף <WH7107> provoked me to wrath אֲבֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> you when your fathers אֹתִ֔י <WH853> אָמַ֖ר <WH559> saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> have not נִחָֽמְתִּי׃ <WH5162> and I repented

כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so שַׁ֤בְתִּי <WH7725> So again זָמַ֙מְתִּי֙ <WH2161> have I thought בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> in these days הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these לְהֵיטִ֥יב <WH3190> to do well אֶת־ <WH853> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> unto Jerusalem וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> and to the house יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָֽאוּ׃ <WH3372> fear

אֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> These הַדְּבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> These [are] the things אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תַּֽעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> that ye shall do דַּבְּר֤וּ <WH1696> Speak אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> the truth אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ye every man אֶת־ <WH854> for רֵעֵ֔הוּ <WH7453> to his neighbour אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> of truth וּמִשְׁפַּ֣ט <WH4941> the judgment שָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> and peace שִׁפְט֖וּ <WH8199> execute בְּשַׁעֲרֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH8179> in your gates

וְאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> And let none אֶת־ <WH853> רָעַ֣ת <WH7451> evil רֵעֵ֗הוּ <WH7453> against his neighbour אַֽל־ <WH408> nay תַּחְשְׁבוּ֙ <WH2803> of you imagine בִּלְבַבְכֶ֔ם <WH3824> in your hearts וּשְׁבֻ֥עַת <WH7621> oath שֶׁ֖קֶר <WH8267> no false אַֽל־ <WH408> not תֶּאֱהָ֑בוּ <WH157> and love כִּ֧י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> for all אֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> are what שָׂנֵ֖אתִי <WH8130> for all these [are things] that I hate נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס
וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> of the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came unto me saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> of hosts צ֣וֹם <WH6685> The fast הָרְבִיעִ֡י <WH7243> of the fourth וְצ֣וֹם <WH6685> [month] and the fast הַחֲמִישִׁי֩ <WH2549> of the fifth וְצ֨וֹם <WH6685> and the fast הַשְּׁבִיעִ֜י <WH7637> of the seventh וְצ֣וֹם <WH6685> and the fast הָעֲשִׂירִ֗י <WH6224> of the tenth יִהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> will become לְבֵית־ <WH1004> shall be to the house יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah לְשָׂשׂ֣וֹן <WH8342> joy וּלְשִׂמְחָ֔ה <WH8057> and gladness וּֽלְמֹעֲדִ֖ים <WH4150> feasts טוֹבִ֑ים <WH2896> and cheerful וְהָאֱמֶ֥ת <WH571> the truth וְהַשָּׁל֖וֹם <WH7965> and peace אֱהָֽבוּ׃ <WH157> therefore love פ

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עֹ֚ד <WH5750> yet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after יָבֹ֣אוּ <WH935> [It shall] yet [come to pass] that there shall come עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> people וְיֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> and the inhabitants עָרִ֥ים <WH5892> cities רַבּֽוֹת׃ <WH7227> of many

וְֽהָלְכ֡וּ <WH1980> [city] shall go יֹשְׁבֵי֩ <WH3427> And the inhabitants אַחַ֨ת <WH259> of one אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחַ֜ת <WH259> to another לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying נֵלְכָ֤ה <WH1980> speedily הָלוֹךְ֙ <WH1980> once לְחַלּוֹת֙ <WH2470> to pray אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וּלְבַקֵּ֖שׁ <WH1245> and to seek אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אֵלְכָ֖ה <WH1980> go גַּם־ <WH1571> will also אָֽנִי׃ <WH589> I

וּבָ֨אוּ <WH935> shall come עַמִּ֤ים <WH5971> people רַבִּים֙ <WH7227> Yea many וְגוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations עֲצוּמִ֔ים <WH6099> and strong לְבַקֵּ֛שׁ <WH1245> to seek אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem וּלְחַלּ֖וֹת <WH2470> and to pray אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD צְבָאוֹת֒ <WH6635> of hosts בַּיָּמִ֣ים <WH3117> In those days הָהֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> those אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after יַחֲזִ֙יקוּ֙ <WH2388> shall take hold עֲשָׂרָ֣ה <WH6235> [it shall come to pass] that ten אֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> men מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all לְשֹׁנ֣וֹת <WH3956> out of all languages הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the nations וְֽהֶחֱזִ֡יקוּ <WH2388> even shall take hold בִּכְנַף֩ <WH3671> of the skirt אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> men יְהוּדִ֜י <WH3064> of a Jew לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying נֵֽלְכָה֙ <WH1980> go עִמָּכֶ֔ם <WH5973> with כִּ֥י <WH3588> for שָׁמַ֖עְנוּ <WH8085> with you for we have heard אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> [that] God עִמָּכֶֽם׃ <WH5973> with ס
